data.actual_result: Unread indicators are barely visible in recent servers section, and completely invisible in channel suggestions.
data.expected_result: Unread indicators should have a proper color so they are clearly visible regardless of theme
data.short_description: In the Quick Switcher, when you are using Light Theme, the unread indicators are barely visible in recent servers section, and completely invisible in channel suggestions
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Light theme - Open Quick Switcher - Observe
